record.id: field.name="count" and file.name="category" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: count
record.file.name: category

brief.brief: The number of times an Incident record in this Category can be reassigned.
If you fill in this field, you must also fill in the reassignment alert time.

detail.detail: When a user reassigns an Incident record, Service Manager updates that record. Since the record was updated, the normal escalation process does not occur, even if no progress is made on resolving the record.

An Incident record can be reassigned many times without getting resolved. This threshold value sets the number of times a record can be reassigned. When this threshold is reached, Incident Management notifies the reassignment group designated in the assignment table after the reassignment interval has passed.
